00025 #ifndef INCLUDE_git_tree_h__
00026 #define INCLUDE_git_tree_h__
00027 
00028 #include "common.h"
00029 #include "types.h"
00030 #include "oid.h"
00031 #include "object.h"
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * @file git2/tree.h
00035  * @brief Git tree parsing, loading routines
00036  * @defgroup git_tree Git tree parsing, loading routines
00037  * @ingroup Git
00038  * @{
00039  */
00040 GIT_BEGIN_DECL
00041 
00042 /**
00043  * Lookup a tree object from the repository.
00044  * The generated tree object is owned by the revision
00045  * repo and shall not be freed by the user.
00046  *
00047  * @param tree pointer to the looked up tree
00048  * @param repo the repo to use when locating the tree.
00049  * @param id identity of the tree to locate.
00050  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00051  */
00052 GIT_INLINE(int) git_tree_lookup(git_tree **tree, git_repository *repo, const git_oid *id)
00053 {
00054         return git_object_lookup((git_object **)tree, repo, id, GIT_OBJ_TREE);
00055 }
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * Create a new in-memory git_tree.
00059  *
00060  * The tree object must be manually filled using
00061  * setter methods before it can be written to its
00062  * repository.
00063  *
00064  * @param tree pointer to the new tree
00065  * @param repo The repository where the object will reside
00066  * @return 0 on success; error code otherwise
00067  */
00068 GIT_INLINE(int) git_tree_new(git_tree **tree, git_repository *repo)
00069 {
00070         return git_object_new((git_object **)tree, repo, GIT_OBJ_TREE);
00071 }
00072 
00073 /**
00074  * Get the id of a tree.
00075  * @param tree a previously loaded tree.
00076  * @return object identity for the tree.
00077  */
00078 GIT_EXTERN(const git_oid *) git_tree_id(git_tree *tree);
00079 
00080 
00081 /**
00082  * Get the number of entries listed in a tree
00083  * @param tree a previously loaded tree.
00084  * @return the number of entries in the tree
00085  */
00086 GIT_EXTERN(size_t) git_tree_entrycount(git_tree *tree);
00087 
00088 /**
00089  * Lookup a tree entry by its filename
00090  * @param tree a previously loaded tree.
00091  * @param filename the filename of the desired entry
00092  * @return the tree entry; NULL if not found
00093  */
00094 GIT_EXTERN(git_tree_entry *) git_tree_entry_byname(git_tree *tree, const char *filename);
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * Lookup a tree entry by its position in the tree
00098  * @param tree a previously loaded tree.
00099  * @param idx the position in the entry list
00100  * @return the tree entry; NULL if not found
00101  */
00102 GIT_EXTERN(git_tree_entry *) git_tree_entry_byindex(git_tree *tree, int idx);
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * Get the UNIX file attributes of a tree entry
00106  * @param entry a tree entry
00107  * @return attributes as an integer
00108  */
00109 GIT_EXTERN(unsigned int) git_tree_entry_attributes(git_tree_entry *entry);
00110 
00111 /**
00112  * Get the filename of a tree entry
00113  * @param entry a tree entry
00114  * @return the name of the file
00115  */
00116 GIT_EXTERN(const char *) git_tree_entry_name(git_tree_entry *entry);
00117 
00118 /**
00119  * Get the id of the object pointed by the entry
00120  * @param entry a tree entry
00121  * @return the oid of the object
00122  */
00123 GIT_EXTERN(const git_oid *) git_tree_entry_id(git_tree_entry *entry);
00124 
00125 /**
00126  * Convert a tree entry to the git_object it points too.
00127  *
00128  * @param object pointer to the converted object
00129  * @param entry a tree entry
00130  * @return a reference to the pointed object in the repository
00131  */
00132 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tree_entry_2object(git_object **object, git_tree_entry *entry);
00133 
00134 /**
00135  * Add a new entry to a tree and return the new entry.
00136  *
00137  * This will mark the tree as modified; the new entry will
00138  * be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00139  *
00140  * @param entry_out Pointer to the entry that just got
00141  *      created. May be NULL if you are not interested on
00142  *      getting the new entry
00143  * @param tree Tree object to store the entry
00144  * @iparam id OID for the tree entry
00145  * @param filename Filename for the tree entry
00146  * @param attributes UNIX file attributes for the entry
00147  * @return 0 on success; otherwise error code
00148  */
00149 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tree_add_entry(git_tree_entry **entry_out, git_tree *tree, const git_oid *id, const char *filename, int attributes);
00150 
00151 /**
00152  * Remove an entry by its index.
00153  *
00154  * Index must be >= 0 and < than git_tree_entrycount().
00155  *
00156  * This will mark the tree as modified; the modified entry will
00157  * be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00158  *
00159  * @param tree Tree where to remove the entry
00160  * @param idx index of the entry
00161  * @return 0 on successful removal; GIT_ENOTFOUND if the entry wasn't found
00162  */
00163 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tree_remove_entry_byindex(git_tree *tree, int idx);
00164 
00165 /**
00166  * Remove an entry by its filename.
00167  *
00168  * This will mark the tree as modified; the modified entry will
00169  * be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00170  *
00171  * @param tree Tree where to remove the entry
00172  * @param filename File name of the entry
00173  * @return 0 on successful removal; GIT_ENOTFOUND if the entry wasn't found
00174  */
00175 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tree_remove_entry_byname(git_tree *tree, const char *filename);
00176 
00177 /**
00178  * Clear all the entries in a tree.
00179  *
00180  * This will mark the tree as modified; the modified entry will
00181  * be written back to disk on the next git_object_write().
00182  *
00183  * @param tree Tree object whose entries are to be sorted
00184  */
00185 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tree_clear_entries(git_tree *tree);
00186 
00187 /**
00188  * Change the SHA1 id of a tree entry.
00189  *
00190  * This will mark the tree that contains the entry as modified;
00191  * the modified entry will be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00192  *
00193  * @param entry Entry object which will be modified
00194  * @param oid new SHA1 oid for the entry
00195  */
00196 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tree_entry_set_id(git_tree_entry *entry, const git_oid *oid);
00197 
00198 /**
00199  * Change the filename of a tree entry.
00200  *
00201  * This will mark the tree that contains the entry as modified;
00202  * the modified entry will be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00203  *
00204  * @param entry Entry object which will be modified
00205  * @param oid new filename for the entry
00206  */
00207 GIT_EXTERN(void) git_tree_entry_set_name(git_tree_entry *entry, const char *name);
00208 
00209 /**
00210  * Change the attributes of a tree entry.
00211  *
00212  * This will mark the tree that contains the entry as modified;
00213  * the modified entry will be written back to disk on the next git_object_write()
00214  *
00215  * @param entry Entry object which will be modified
00216  * @param oid new attributes for the entry
00217  * @return 0 if the attributes were properly set; error code otherwise
00218  */
00219 GIT_EXTERN(int) git_tree_entry_set_attributes(git_tree_entry *entry, unsigned int attr);
00220 
00221 /** @} */
00222 GIT_END_DECL
00223 #endif
